title: Polisport S-Mud fender instantly attaches to your saddle
content:
Tired of showing up to functions with mud up your back but donâ€™t want the hassle of a mudguard that requires tools to remove and replace? Check out the Polisport S-Mud clip-on fender, which attaches and detaches from your saddle rails in seconds. No more sloppy multitool install/uninstall. No more unnecessarily rocking a fender in

The post Polisport S-Mud fender instantly attaches to your saddle appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
